title: Docker Swarm Config Files
description: This lab showcases the config swarm feature that allow config objects to be attached to services. Config files can be mounted inside services' containers, avoiding the need to bake configuration into images.

meta.title: Mastering Docker Swarm Configuration Files
meta.description: Explore the powerful config feature in Docker Swarm, allowing you to manage service configurations securely and efficiently.
meta.keywords: linux lab, linux practice exercises, online kali linux terminal, practice linux commands online, linux practice online, docker command line, docker playground, linux labs, linux tutor, kali linux online
